website_summaries.verdict: This set of 12 glasses are elegant and convenient as they require no assembly, yet they still provide the aesthetic of a stemmed glass.
pros: These arrive nicely packaged in plastic sleeves
If washed by hand, these can be reused as desired
Made in the USA from BPA-free material, making them a product you can feel good about purchasing and using
Shatterproof material makes these ideal for outdoor events
cons: Seam on glass may be noticeable to some

website_summaries.verdict: The perfect budget option for events, holiday parties, birthdays, and anniversaries, and they are solid enough to be reused.
pros: These inexpensive acrylic flutes feature a durable construction that allow them to be reused
The elegantly styled flutes look just like they're made of glass but are less delicate and are BPA-free
They are also safe to wash in the dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure how something like this passed through quality control
customer_reviews.text: My package came with two defective glasses. I'm not sure how something like this passed through quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Wedding worthy
customer_reviews.text: We used these for a toast at a seaside wedding because glassware is prohibited on the beach. They looked lovely, even in the photos. Aside from the seams (and a less musical 'clink'), you would have thought they were glass. These flutes are reasonably priced, and definitely a cut above the usual plasticware.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS glasses for a pre-event limo ride!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a few boxes of these for a work event where we wanted to have champagne in the limo on the way to a swanky event. They were great!! I am REALLY impressed with how high end they looked in-person!!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice disposable champagne flutes
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were well made and exactly what I was looking for. Nicely made of clear acrylic. There were no damaged items and each glass was packed well in individual plastic sleeves. Would highly recommend for parties and other festive occasions. Well priced for this quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these acrylic champagne flutes! They're very sturdy and great quality. At first and second glance they look just like glass. However, you can see a faint line on the bottom of the flute where it was sealed together, but it's not noticeable and not a big deal. These are one piece and very elegant looking. I'm using them for a patio girl's brunch that I'm having in a few weeks. I'm very happy about my purchase, and will buy more for larger events!
customer_reviews.author: M.S.L.

customer_reviews.title: I did a good bit of research as I'd heard (and read) about ...
customer_reviews.text: I did a good bit of research as I'd heard (and read) about many that came apart - the 2 piece ones that don't fit well or stay - and others that were poor quality and leaked. These were perfect! May be a bit more expensive but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my lingerie ladies night and it was a hit. Sturdy, fancy looking, and they look expensive for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You definitely NEED these for your event!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a boating trip and they were perfect. I'm not one to give 5 stars but these flutes deserve it. It was nicely packed when it came. The glass is sturdy, looks elegant and perfect for any event. I've bought champagne glasses like these before but other brands need assembly. No assembly is required for these! You can also re-use these glasses. Although these flutes are disposable, they are of such high quality! You do not want to regret not buying these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: mea024

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: First of all glad they're made in the US. Next day shipping and they all are straight, sit flat, and look pretty darned terrific. We'll be using them for a bachelorette weekend and I'll keep any for home unless the girls want theirs. Yes you can see the seams on some but they're thicker and sturdier than any I've seen online or in stores. I think they're great! Thinking about getting a set of the multi colored wine glasses, too.
customer_reviews.author: sgabree

customer_reviews.title: Got first order with scratches, second order late and a flute short.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and i thought they were nice. The flutes have scrathes on them so I had to return it. I, then, ordered a new set because I really like how the flutes look like, however my second order took forever to get where i am. I was supposed to receive it on January 10th, but did not get it until January 12th, too late for its intended purpose. I opened the scond box, hoping to just keep them, but it only contained 11 flutes, not 12. So I'll be returning them too.
customer_reviews.author: Karenine DeCato

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Super value. A little prone to tipping over because they are rather light. The acrylic could be thicker and there is a visible “seam,” but for casual occasions very nice. Tendency to spot in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: arasenna

customer_reviews.title: These champagne flutes were perfect for our last minute front yard wedding!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter's wedding was scheduled to take place in New Orleans. Due to the Corona-virus, she and her fiance decided to do a small, casual wedding in our front yard - with neighbors looking on. It was magical We wanted champagne flutes that were sturdy but beautiful, held just the right amount, and were reasonably priced and could arrive within a few days! These were so perfect, that when the first dozen arrived, I immediately ordered another dozen! - which were delivered the next day! - the day of the wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect flutes!
customer_reviews.text: These plastic flutes arrived in perfect condition. Each one was individually wrapped in plastic. They are one piece and very sturdy. Perfect for champagne or mimosas. I hand washed mine, and put them away to be used again. Very good quality and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Ally P.

customer_reviews.title: Great looks and quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's wedding. Sturdy construction, feel substantial. No flaws. Only the standard barely visible parting line you'd expect in a molded product. Like that they are one piece. No assembly required. Reusable if you're careful and wash by hand.
customer_reviews.author: J. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Used last night at party, hand washed, and plan to use again. Well packaged; no scratches or chips. Great value compared to disposable ones and safer than glass.
customer_reviews.author: Gail J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I got them for my outdoor wedding. From the look of them, you would NEVER guess they're not glass. Great size and shape, the plastic is thick and hardy. Only down side is the seam of the plastic can be felt on your fingertips when holding the flute. It's not enough of a downside to lower my 5-star rating, and the seem is not sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy exactly how many you need because during shipping,  one may crack
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my friend's wedding while the bridesmaids were getting ready and they were great. When they arrived , there was one cracked cup but it was extra so we didn't need it. I would recommend this seller and product because they arrived on time and the product was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hewett

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I get what the other folks mean when they say these are hard to throw away! They are excellent. I personally dislike cheap looking plastic glasses which is why I went with these. You really cant tell they arent glass until you hold them and even then, you may still question it. These are made really well and are super durable. I would definitely use them when hosting an event.
customer_reviews.author: Marselle R.

customer_reviews.title: Very Realistic to Glass
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for a bridal shower on a boat. Because you cannot have glass on board I found these. I was pleasantly surprised to see how realistic they looked to glass. Very sturdy and I love that it is one piece. I hate when you have 2 pieces and the bottom falls off, that is not an issue with these. Will definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Priced right!
customer_reviews.text: I eloped and decided to throw an impromptu cook out to celebrate and wanted to at least have a champagne toast but didnt want to shell out the money for 2 dozen glass flutes when we were only going to use them once so I ordered these 5 oz plastic flutes and they look amazing! They are well made and for the price you cant beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Good for parties
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are entertaining folks who drink sparkling wine frequently, they shouldn't care that these aren't crystal. Good price, no issues with the dishwasher either.
customer_reviews.author: tallhapa

customer_reviews.title: Great Champagne glasses
customer_reviews.text: These were great. much better than the 2 part glasses where the bottom falls off all the time. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Agan

customer_reviews.title: Plastic?! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these plastic flutes. Look expensive and add class to any occasion. I will order more in the future
customer_reviews.author: Twlia

customer_reviews.title: at last, an acceptably classy plastic flute!
customer_reviews.text: We needed fifty glasses for an open house for our Bed and Breakfast -- and wanted flutes as close to glass in look and feel as we could get. These flutes are perfect... just a little bit more expensive than the screw base flutes, but more than worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven L

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Good product, a little flimsy but worked for what I needed. Looks better in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Full Size
customer_reviews.text: I looked at other options but all seemed to small and I wanted a true measured pour for my guest. These are well crafted and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Short

customer_reviews.title: perfect for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Plastic so they last with kids, i bought them for New Years party with our kids, I’ll probably use them for a fancy valentines dinner also! They are small enough too it’s just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W.

customer_reviews.title: Truly a premium product!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely lovely. They are acrylic, but are clear and extremely sturdy. Packaging is amazing...each one individually wrapped in plastic. All came in perfect condition. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Wsb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a holiday party
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for an annual NYE party. In prior years, the plastic champagne glasses purchased were not of a quality to consider being re-used. Everyone was impressed with the quality of the flutes and they have been cleaned and packed away for next year's party. Very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of glasses very good; one box only contained 8 glasses
customer_reviews.text: Just some quick feedback for the seller: I ordered two boxes of 12. One box only had 8 glasses (the other had the expected 12). It was still enough for my small event, but maybe something to look into for other customer orders. The quality and presentation of the glasses was very nice, perfect for a one-off event with champagne.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very well made product and happy that it is made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made product and happy that it is made in the USA. They look great and I feel good knowing there is no chance of breakage when we are celebrating outdoors. I would recommend that the manufacturer not ship each flute in its own plastic bag but find an easily recyclable product (tissue?) to wrap them instead.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Firestone

customer_reviews.title: Expected mediocre got really quite nice
customer_reviews.text: I am always leery of purchasing plastic products online, but was pleasantly surprised to find these glasses to feel good in your hand and look great on the table.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: As Pretty as Glass!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly acceptable for plastic champagne flutes! Used for kids champagne at our intimate wedding and some of the guests didn't even realize we had glass flutes displayed for adults and were using these since they looked so nice. Definitely get these if you must go with plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel B.

customer_reviews.title: Wedding & party quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a kids tea party ( apple juice !) Nice looks like the real thing. Great take home gift!
customer_reviews.author: NC4714

customer_reviews.title: I really like these. There were so many options to pick ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. There were so many options to pick from for plastic flutes. I'm lucky I chose there. They are VERY sturdy, no way they would break or crack. They are all one piece, and they look just like glass. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for the groomsmen and the bridesmaids as the head table for my wedding reception. They’re really nice for plastic. They have imprinted on the bottoms that they’re made in the US and BPA free, which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Tigerlily

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t see at first they’re plastic but they’re great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Christmas toast. I didn’t see that they’re not glass but to honest, it’s better. No breaking. They’re light but sturdy and if somebody drinks too much, I’m covered.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Get these!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my Mother's Day Brunch! Now I'm going to use them in the salon to serve champagne to the clients. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: I hate to ever use plastic wine "glasses" or flutes
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we were looking for. I hate to ever use plastic wine "glasses" or flutes, but just needed them for a quick toast. These looked nice and were sturdy. I ordered many extras because I was convinced many would break during shipping, but they all arrived in perfect condition! If I ever have to go with plastic again, I would definitely get these.
customer_reviews.author: M Lewis Deeter

customer_reviews.title: You won't miss the glass!
customer_reviews.text: Used on a champagne wall for an engagement party and they were perfect. Especially since we were outside by a pool there were no worries about glass breaking.
customer_reviews.author: DCour

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful and worked great for a birthday party!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and elegant
customer_reviews.text: It is a little smaller than our cut glass glasses but not noticeable unless you use the larger ones often. They are very sturdy and will be great around the pool where glass is a no no. The shape is elegant as well.
customer_reviews.author: Love the Water

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We used them during a party , I felt they were very sturdy and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: I loved them. Seemed very real
customer_reviews.text: Used for our beach wedding toast. I loved them. Seemed very real!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these the night before I needed them (last minute champagne birthday toast). They arrived on time and were good quality. I was very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Cook

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for wedding parties or any nice event where you don’t want to use expensive breakable ...
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for wedding parties or any nice event where you don’t want to use expensive breakable glass. Guest live the real look of champagne flutes only the host knows...
customer_reviews.author: mlowell

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive advertised amount of product.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 12 plastic champagne flutes as advertised. The order arrived with only 11 glasses in the box. The box was large enough for only 11 glasses and that is what we got. We paid for 12 and received 11. Not pleased with this order.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are perfect if you’re looking for ones that resemble glass. They are individually wrapped and well packed. Pretty heavy duty and all one piece.
customer_reviews.author: SheilaC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Champagne Flutes!
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy and look very nice. Would defintly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie rock

customer_reviews.title: Such good quality. Bought them for a party and ended ...
customer_reviews.text: Such good quality. Bought them for a party and ended up washing them to reuse because they're so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W

customer_reviews.title: Real glass look alike
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. They are sturdy and look like real glass. I can't wait to fill them with mimosa's before my daughter's wedding!
customer_reviews.author: EHof

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: A hit at the party. Others were asking where I bought them. Better than the 2-piece glasses that fall apart so easy and are so flimsy. Very durable, packaged nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Pope

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sturdy set of flutes. Love that they are one piece and re-usable!
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: 5 out of 12.
customer_reviews.text: I received 5 good glasses, and 7 broken glasses. The glasses do seem to be of good quality, and I would leave a higher star review if I'd received all 12 glasses intact.
customer_reviews.author: Ketel

customer_reviews.title: Great 🍾
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my sister’s baby shower. They were great!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Jo

customer_reviews.title: Good for outdoor celebration
customer_reviews.text: Really worked well for a large outdoor celebration. In fact, just ordered more to keep around for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: JustmeL

customer_reviews.title: They arrived broken and not as the full 12 set ...
customer_reviews.text: They arrived broken and not as the full 12 set, 2 were missing entirely. I had to go out and buy others at Party City.
customer_reviews.author: Bret And Rachel Winfield

customer_reviews.title: Great “glasses”
customer_reviews.text: These are great champagne “glasses”. You could definitely reuse these a few time before they get scratched up. My set came individually wrapped in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Visible side seams.
customer_reviews.text: They had a seam that stuck out on both sides, making them uncomfortable to hold and aesthetically displeasing. This was not shown or mentioned in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wedding
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wedding, haven't used yet, but perfect just what expected
customer_reviews.author: Erica Esquibel

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality for the price I will definitely buy other products from them.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: More than a great value
customer_reviews.text: I received them today expecting something of less quality for the price for my 923 Party ,..But when I opened the box I was truly impressed with the product and yes I will order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the little extra
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality for plastic. Purchased for an outdoor anniversary celebration. I liked that they are not flimsy, are one piece and the bottoms didn't fall off like the cheaper brand.
customer_reviews.author: MKR

customer_reviews.title: Mardi Gras crowd pleaser
customer_reviews.text: Will be using these as foundations for Mardi Gras decorative pieces that will be tossed during our parade. The sturdy, one piece construction makes these ideal for this type of project.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Craig

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: The flutes were a much better quality than the snap together type. A bit pricey but worth it for a special event. Excellent service and delivery and packaging.
customer_reviews.author: nforrtunato

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful. Will be using them at our daughters wedding ...
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were everything I expected. They are beautiful. Will be using them at our daughters wedding reception. I would definitely recommend them. Could definitely wash and reuse over and over. Thanks for a great product at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and quality glasses for plastic. Worked perfect for a holiday brunch.
customer_reviews.author: Impressions Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! They look just like real glass champagne flutes without the worry of them breaking. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful and the perfect size for toasting. I also thought the cost was exceptional too.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Magee

customer_reviews.title: They're super classy and looks very real
customer_reviews.text: They're super classy and looks very real. Survived the dishwasher with a setting of a heavy and hi temp wash. Def reccommend
customer_reviews.author: Sfc_annivie

customer_reviews.title: Worked nicely, good value
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! Look very nice, good quality for a garden bridal shower. Didn't have to worry about breaking glass, and these will be reused. Each flute was wrapped in plastic and loose in a single box, but all arrived intact and no scratches.
customer_reviews.author: D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They worked great. I wished they would have been a little stronger but they did the job
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled with the quality of these flutes. I had been expecting to throw them out after they were used for a particular outdoor celebration but they are too nice to pitch. And the quick delivery was unexpected. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Great option vs glass!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice alternative to glass flutes - especially when toasting with large groups. Good quality plastic and all in one piece (not the snap together type). We will save them and hopefully re-use them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Russ D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent...
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy and really do not look like plastic at all. Pleased as punch with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sewing Fool

customer_reviews.title: All the glasses are scratched
customer_reviews.text: Their fine flute glasses inexpensive, but every single one of them is scratched up. They just don’t look nice. And it’s too late to send them back and get others. I am disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty flutes!!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and sturdy flutes! Christmas present for daughter...she loved them!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: These are not what I expected. They look flimsy and cheap for what I needed them for. Great for just throw away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality and def served its purpose for the event ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the product in a timely fashion, good quality and def served its purpose for the event I was throwing. Everyone thought the product was very cute and had no idea I ordered it from amazon... def will reorder for another event!! Thank you for having a great product and shipping in a timely fashion. '
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look great, used them to toast the New Year with friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and in perfect shape, no damage
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in perfect shape, no damage. Flutes are sturdy and no tipping-over issues. Easy to clean and reuse.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kincer

customer_reviews.title: great outdoor glass
customer_reviews.text: great product, sturdy purchased the wine glasses in the past and know that they are the same ones sold in a dept store for twice the price
customer_reviews.author: maryh

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy champagne glasses.. you can re use serveral times. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Marssel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved! They looked elegant and washed crystal clear! They looked absolutely beautiful with the sparkling bubbly and frozen raspberries!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for holiday party champagne bar!
customer_reviews.text: Flutes showed up on time, as described, and individually wrapped. I will purchase them again for future events.
customer_reviews.author: LinzMay

customer_reviews.title: a little less sturdy than I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: Very light material, a little less sturdy than I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: The flute has a seam running the whole length of the glass.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the seam that ran the length of the glass. If they were seamless they would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lambo

customer_reviews.title: Best plastic flutes i have found
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice cross between nice glasses and cheap plastic. They don't look like plastic, but they do scratch easily.
customer_reviews.author: SSOHSS

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy-duty plastic glasses. These things could be reused several times!
customer_reviews.author: flyingnimbus2001

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses for the price! We used them all night for champagne and wine to celebrate!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality/had manufacture defect but still shipped it out
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my Fiancé bachelorette party in another state, arrived with 5 defective/broken glass.
customer_reviews.author: Cory J Stockman

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied with these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with these glasses. They are actually nicer than I expected. The plastic is a really nice quality and perfectly clear like glass.
customer_reviews.author: bnath

customer_reviews.title: Good looking "fake glassware"
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, comfortable to use, and good looking. Pleasantly surprised that they went through the dishwasher just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but better quality control needed.
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 12 flutes had manufacturing defects (not round at the top), so needed to be disgarded.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look Like Glass.
customer_reviews.text: Flutes are right size and shape. Flutes are nice and clear and have a nice weight to them.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Lanaux

customer_reviews.title: They were perfect for the pontoon
customer_reviews.text: They look very elegant and don't have that chinsey plastic appearance. They were perfect for the pontoon!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Rae

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable
customer_reviews.text: Served the purpose, but definitely felt like a plastic glass. I was trying to match acrylic champagne glasses I had seen which were difficult to distinguish from glass These did not fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful and much better quality than I expected. Hand washed them to be reused again and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Dean

customer_reviews.title: Crystal looking champagne glasses!
customer_reviews.text: The glasses look just like real crystal. We bought them to take on our boat for special occasions opening the bubbly! Taking the boat out next weekend to try them out celebrating Boating season!
customer_reviews.author: Betty L. G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, not cheap looking. Love that they are all in one, no pieces to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: AzPBCC

product_meta.title: Plastic 5-ounce One Piece Champagne Flute | set of 12 Clear
feature_bullets: Made in USA | 5-ounce maximum capacity | BPA-free
Reusable champagne flutes for any occasion | Serve bubbly, mimosas, and more at showers, weddings, or retirement parties
Premium plastic will not shatter like crystal | Classic fluted design is great for entertaining
8-7/8-inches tall and 2-1/8-inch mouth diameter | One-piece design is a step up from disposable
Set of 12 clear reusable plastic champagne flutes
